title: Semantic Segmentation of Biomass Images
description: Trained a neural network to produce pixel-level annotations on a sample image
Implemented transfer learning to create a network with 70% accuracy
Created a web server using Docker that performed segmentation on user-uploaded images

title: Real-time Chat App
description: Created a browser-based chat app that allows people to communicate with each other
Optimized chat interface to send images 20% faster
Identified and fixed 30+ bugs related to invalid messages

title: Pathfinding Algorithm Visualization
description: Reduced rendering times by 10% by changing how visited locations were stored
Implemented the Breadth-First, Depth-First, and A* pathfinding algorithms
Increased the maximum graph size by 50% by only redrawing recently visited nodes
